p: Cells were seeded in 96-well plates and exposed to the essential oil of A. membranacea at concentrations up to 100 μg/mL for 72 h. 1,8-cineole and doxorubicin concentrations were made up to 50 µM also for 72 h. MTT assay was then performed as previously reported [ 43]. Absorbances were measured using a multi-plate reader at a wavelength 550 nm. IC 50 values were determined by calculated the oil concentration-induced 50% reduction in the absorbance compared to untreated control.
